name: Call for Help
effect: Until the start of your next turn, if someone tries to use the Help Other action on you, you only need a 7+ Toughness roll to be healed, and if you are brought to a positive amount of Wounds, you can immediately stand up from {status:prone}.

name: Charge
effect: {power:move} or {power:disengage}, then make a {power:melee-basic-attack:Melee Basic Attack}.

name: Cleave
target:
All creatures in 3 adjacent squares 
in your weapon range
effect: HIT - [Weapon] damage.

name: Defend
effect: Until the start of your next round, you gain an additional Quick action that you can spend only for {power:dodge}, {power:parry} or {power:shield-block:Shield Block}.

name: Disengage
effect: You move 2 squares. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Dodge
requirements: Trigger: You are hit by an Attack or a Spell
effect:
Make an Agility roll. If you are wearing heavy armor, you have a -3 penalty to the roll.
If your roll is higher than the attack roll that hit you, you dodge the attack - the attack misses you.

name: Double Strike
effect: Make 2 {power:melee-basic-attack:Melee Basic Attacks}.

name: Help Other
effect:
You can {power:move} or {power:disengage} before or after Help Other.
The target ally can make a Toughness roll. On a 9+, the target Ally immediately recovers an amount of Wounds equal to his/her Injured value (without spending Endurance).
If the Ally is Calling for Help, he/she only needs to roll a 7+, and if healed to a positive amount of Wounds, he/she can immediately stand up from {status:prone}.

name: Melee Basic Attack
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect: HIT - [Weapon] damage.

name: Move
effect:
You move a number of squares equal to your Movement Speed.
If you leave an area threatened by a creature, you provoke an Opportunity Attack from the creature.

name: Parry
requirements:
Melee Weapon
Trigger: You are hit by a Melee Attack
You can only parry Melee Attacks made by creatures up to one size larger than you.
effect:
Make an attack roll.
If your roll is higher than the attack roll that hit you, the attack misses you instead of hitting you.

name: Ranged Basic Attack
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect: HIT - [Weapon] damage.

name: Ready
effect: Until the start of your next round, you gain an additional Quick action that you can spend only for a {power:melee-basic-attack:Melee Basic Attack}.

name: Recover
effect:
You can spend an Endurance point to recover an amount of Wounds equal to your Injured value.
You then obtain a secondary effect based on your Energy (this happens also if you do not spend Endurance).

name: Rush
effect: You can {power:move}, {power:stand-up:Stand Up}, or {power:swap}, and then make a Basic Attack ({power:melee-basic-attack:Melee}, {power:ranged-basic-attack:Ranged} or {power:spell-basic-attack:Spell}).

name: Shield Block
requirements:
Shield
Trigger: You are hit by an Attack or a Spell
effect: Roll your shield [Block]: the triggering attack damage is reduced by this amount.

name: Spell Basic Attack
effect: HIT - [Spell] damage. The damage source is the same as the attunement that you used to cast the spell.

name: Sprint
effect: You {power:move} twice, {power:disengage} twice, or Disengage and Move (or viceversa).

name: Stand Up
effect: You stand up and are no longer prone.

name: Swap
effect:
You can change your equipped weapons, shield and/or attunements.
You can {power:move}, {power:disengage} or {power:stand-up:Stand Up} as part of Swap.
